website_summaries.verdict: Has a classic scissor-lift design, and comes with a variety of extras to meet any roadside emergency head on.
pros: Reaches its maximum lift height of 16.5" within 2 minutes
Kit includes an impact wrench and a tire inflator
Has a built-in LED for night use
Comes with a carrying case and 2 removable raised heads for sedans or SUVs
cons: Impact wrench takes some time to charge between uses (there is a pause after you pull the trigger)

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this jack!
customer_reviews.text: I created a video to explain everything. Overall, I'd rate this a 10/10, I liked how easy it is to use. There's also one thing I did not mention in the video. The tool also comes with 3 spare glass fuses. This is great because A). you can protect your motor and B). you have replacements in case the fuse blows. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: GrapefruitTechnique

customer_reviews.title: It is worth spent money
customer_reviews.text: Recently I was struggling with my old regular jack during I changing my brake pads (It was at that moment that I first thought about buying an electric jack). Regular jack requires a lot of effort, who used regular jack will understand me). The electric jack worth spent money. This one is sturdy and made from thick steel (3 ton!). Notes: The total rise time from the lowest position to the extreme upper position is 1 minute 44 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Vityok

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The first time I saw this jack, I bought it and tried it. It doesn't take much effort. It has enough weight and will not slip. It is high enough. It can easily support the front wheel. There are two heads to choose the height.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good grief, this makes changing a tire easier.
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping to eventually have one of these type of jacks in all my vehicles. SO MUCH better than the old crank it up with elbow grease style. Simply take it out of the case, find a secure spot to put it, and push the button and watch your vehicle lift off the ground in seconds!! Where have 12V electric jacks been all my life?? The only downfall I see at all is that it will take up a bit of room in your vehicle, but I think it's worth the space. Changing a tire just got a WHOLE LOT easier.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe69

customer_reviews.title: Powerbuilt SUV All-in-One Jack Review
customer_reviews.text: These are super jacks which are easy to use. I have a BMW Xi. bought this to change my oil, tire rotation, etc.. and I found them easy to use, secure and well built. I even used them on my wife's SUV, though I needed to raise it with a floor jack first to fit these underneath. They work great either just as a safety feature or a replacement jack. It come with a pair of glove too that very thoughtful. I give it 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Tran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I received the jack within just about three weeks ago after I order it. I tried it out on my car which it preformed very well. It was pretty much what I expected. Good size and not too heavy, very easy to use, not slow. I don’t have any complaints for this.
customer_reviews.author: James Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been spoiled using one of lower quality than this, this thing is really cool and amazing. I would absolutely get this again for another vehicle. I tested it out and it actually lifted the whole one side of the vehicle so it is very strong. I let my wife use it to see if she could do it herself , it took her a little longer but she did the whole thing herself with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: scott's buy

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: All-in-all it seems to work. I don't think it would last if used often but for occasional tire change it should do fine. The manual crank is worthless even in a pinch. Forget it is even there. I gave it four out of five for the manual crank. I'm very mechnical and have worked in the automotive and building maintenance trades. I fiddled with the crank for awhile until I finally got it to go all the way in. I turned the crank and the threaded rod dosen't rotate. The electric part is fine for lite use.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, very easy to use, easy to control
customer_reviews.text: I know most of us has AAA service, but we all know every time when you trying to use it, you don’t know how long you are going to wait for the service person to show up. Sometimes 30 minutes, sometimes could be hours. When my girlfriend told me about electric car jack, I bought one for myself. I tested it after I received it, it made the job so easy. With a simply bottom push, the car been jacked up. It comes with a pair of gloves that keep our hands clean, no worry about scratch the finger nails. This is something you got to have but wish never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works well & is perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good jack that is really helpful and useful! It works great just plug into cig lighter and up the car goes, just push the button. Comes in a very nice case which makes it easy to store in the trunk. Very convenient for us when we are at our travel time. My husband is quite pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Corley

customer_reviews.title: Looks the same model as a previous model I was replacing, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: This one has worked for a year. The OTHER electric jack I bought was bad the second time I used it. The "down" button was dead. SO I wanted a better quality jack and spent more--getting this one. Turns out it looks like the exact same thing except in a fancy box and includes some accessories. The problem with the Concept is the pretty control box with micro-switch buttons leading to relays. But a micro-switch failed on the OTHER model. AGAIN, this model has been good for a year now, but I'm not comfortable with microswitches. I wish it were a different switch.
customer_reviews.author: BigSmiler

customer_reviews.title: works great, used last week to raise my car
customer_reviews.text: works great, used last week to raise my car. did a good job at raising my car. it's great to carry in the vehicle for emergency stituations
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Woods SR.

customer_reviews.title: All in all, a great set.
customer_reviews.text: I have this in case of emergencies to keep in the back of my car. I wanted something simple that included pretty much everything. I don't have a lot of experience with this stuff. This is great set for a novice and those more knowledgeable. I like that it can be powered by the cigarette lighter. It is also much easier to use and more convenient than the manual ones. I did look into buying everything separately but, in the end, it was more expensive. All in all, a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST JACK YOU WILL EVER OWN.
customer_reviews.text: The best jack you will ever own as this is so easy and fast to set up, it will make tire replacement or lifting your car for whatever purpose super easy. My wife used this and she loved it. The complete package is very useful, I did contact the support, and they were very helpful and prompt on resolving the matter. You will not regret it and it is money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice back saver for my 52 year old but!!
customer_reviews.text: It lifts my Silverado just take your time and go In bursts and you should never trip a fuse although you get 3 extra ones. It also lifted my 26’ camper to check the bearings and no problem. Take your time lube it up and it should last a while it gets decent reviews on you tube and these guys abuse the you know what out of them. Like they use it as a shop lift I think one guy said he got 300 or so lifts before the bearing went kablui. 75 bucks what do you want!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Serviis

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: There is also a toolbox that is small and doesn’t take up space. Due to the heavy-duty thickening steel plate, large base, and compact triangle design. Furthermore, it will automatically stop working when it reaches the height limitation, I teried it. It takes only about 2 minuets to reach a maximum height. Whether man or woman can replace the tire with ease in any emergent case.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Easily lifts a 4,600 lb. Acura MDX
customer_reviews.text: It took a minute or two, but this jack picked my 4,600 lb. Acura MDX off the ground. If things go wrong in the future, I'll change the review, but as of now, I'm impressed. It's a lot easier to hold down a button than crank a jack dozens of times.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Kondo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: This is top notice the greatest thing ever invented. I was having issue with getting the trailer unhooked. Bought this electric jack. Plug it in. Chuck the trailer tires. Push the button and puff, of the ball the trailer comes. Easy to use light weight good height. Also have used it to change tires and brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank "The Man" Gruber

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1 nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: This item made my dad's day, i bought it for his birthday, and he was happy to see how it works, it is very convenient for everyone, during travel time, he will never be afraid of tire blow out, as the electric jack will just help him to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Electric car jack strongly made and well priced
customer_reviews.text: Bought this electric car jack a few weeks ago. It works very well at lifting my car enough to be able to change my tire. I like that it has all the parts that I need to jack my car and change my tire. The jack also appears to be made of very strong material which is important to me. It was also very reasonably priced for all that came with the jack. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O’Reilly

customer_reviews.title: It worked on my pickup
customer_reviews.text: Well, it picked up my RAM 1500 with a 5.7 hemi front wheel/tire high enough to change a flat, with a bit of travel left to go. Would definitely place something under the base if not on a solid surface, as like most scissor style jacks it is a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will work good if your cautious and safe.
customer_reviews.text: Where the Jack pins attaches to the base needs to be a lot sturdier - not very good for a SUV if the jack is at heigh. I suggest a very level surface, chock the wheels good, and put the jack on stable block of wood to shorten the distance between the Jack and the vehicle. ALWAYS put a jack stand under the lifted vehicle and drop jack down just enough that the jack stand won't wiggle. Stay Safe My Friends!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Electric car jack
customer_reviews.text: I choose this electric jack over the regular jack that comes with the vehicle, say goodbye to the hand cranking jack and hello to electric jack. The company that made this product much easier to use, i give them thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wuollet

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6 uses. Failed and rolled..
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for 2 test uses and 4 tires to change. Was very happy with how easy it was and fairly quick to lift. Tried to use after 1 month on a small Ford Fiesta and the base of the arms snapped, causing it to roll under the car while lifting. This was on a flat nearly level surface with a couple test lifts (lifted frame 1-2") prior to fully lifting. Back to using the manual jack..
customer_reviews.author: David Holliday

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of 💩! On my first use it broke and my car went down with it... luckily I didn't get hurt and hopefully no significant damage was caused to my car.
customer_reviews.author: ICSr

customer_reviews.title: Am I using the impact wrench correctly?
customer_reviews.text: The jack worked great. What is up with the impact wrench? The sockets fit the lugs perfectly but would just spin on the impact wrench spindle. Am I missing a part? Or, am I dong something wrong? Anyone have suggestions or ideas let me know please..
customer_reviews.author: William McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing was hoping this would be convent while wrking on vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Broke on first use trying to lift vehicle not really sure if this was a new one looks like it might have been a return that was used but customer didn't like and was returned and might have been defective to begin with returning item waiting to see how quickly refund gets processed disappointing cause it was intend on as a early xmas gift
customer_reviews.author: deborah molner

customer_reviews.title: Best insurance you can have.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, got it home, the wife and I put the spare tire on in the garage. Then both of us took the spare tire off and put the regular tire on. Education 101. Never had to do it again. YES, no flats while on the road. Can not say how long the jack will last because she has not had to use it. But, if she ever has problems she will be ahead of the game. Been there done that. Hope your luck is good as mine. Just tell it like it is.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Money

customer_reviews.title: Will be helpful when you need one
customer_reviews.text: It lifts up my Chevy Subarban. Impact driver not strong enough to take the nuts out but still usable after hand cranking the nuts. Pump was working. - a little to big to store in a car - a little too heavy Overall it is ok especially when you have.a flat tire
customer_reviews.author: NJHammer

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE FAILURE: tires were 3" off ground when motor seized (1.5 ton Jeep). Left with vehicle stuck in 100* heat and NO OPTIONS. the plastic cranked supplied was useless; barely fit and flimsy. 2/10
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Reber

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Looks really massive and strong, feels like a good quality, very comfortable to work with, arrived in a tool box- very organized and easy to storage. It can be connected to the car which is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mordi

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: used it two times an it bent an wont lift anymore.would not suggest anyone buy it.
customer_reviews.author: benny

customer_reviews.title: the jack and case is scuffed up and dirty, very upset and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Arrives scuffed up , received a used one , the jack and case is scuffed up and dirty , very upset and disappointed, Also the head that makes contact with the vehicle is made of Plastic it broke in two pieces at first use ,why would they make it plastic ? I don’t know, It should all be made of steel , it’s a Jack ,nothing on a jack should be made of plastic ,Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Ok. But Not Totally Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Averagely ok. Fuse burnt a few times. It also fused my Cigarette/charger port. The nut torquing/untorquing device never gets to work as I intend it to. Sometimes it does other times it doesn't. Generally the jack does lift the vehicle nicely. Just that it seems to burn a fuse at some point & then all functions stop. No relief botton to reduce the jack when this happens. So you get to use a manual jack just so that you can take off this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work like I expected
customer_reviews.text: A friend had one of these and talked about how great it was. I had a flat on my boat trailer and this just didn't work. Don't know if my electrical connection was perfect or not but it didn't raise the trailer right. Luckily I had my old floor jack still in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Captain 47

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised on my Jeep Wrangler. Much easier to use - and safer. With the remote, you can stand off to the side and reduce the risk of being injured by a shifting vehicle. I wish it fit in my storage space though but the case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful an easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this floor jack it lifted one side of my 2015 Kia Optima with Ez ,while I rotated my tires (probably would not recommend doing that to often) I tighten the lug nuts with a Cheetah bar last time a rotating the tires .this jack loosen the lug nuts with ez and quickness absolutely recommend it.... PS Recommend starting vehicle for more power
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Preston

customer_reviews.title: like most of them eventually do
customer_reviews.text: This product saves you the drudgery of manual jacks. I think it was worth it. My old hydraulic jack leaked, like most of them eventually do.
customer_reviews.author: michael berta

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Just did the brakes on all 4 corners. Worked like a charm. No issues. Nice and stable. 12v so you could take it on the road. Heck of a lot better than the one that comes with the car.
customer_reviews.author: Slider162

customer_reviews.title: It makes your life a little easier
customer_reviews.text: It speed up the whole tire changing process, it's worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Do a better job of reviewing item
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help me while out on the road, I tested it on my trailer before I went anywhere erase the trailer a little but did not get the tire off the ground it seems to stall out I waited too long for a return
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: power
customer_reviews.text: Electric power is much easier,And it's easy to manipulate. The box is very strong and professional.I like this very much
customer_reviews.author: yong.

customer_reviews.title: Every car must have this inside!
customer_reviews.text: Every car must have this inside!this come in a great looking and very string box, great to keep in the car in case we need it! it is simple to use!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Good for an emergency!
customer_reviews.text: Blew a fuse when I first tried to use it, put in another fuse and since then it’s been fine! Jack got stuck once did not want to come down, had to wait three minutes for the motor to cool off and then after that it’s been working fine! Don’t know why but we’re gonna hang on it because it’s working OK now! Good for emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fancy tool with a special usage
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I love it! My bed beam is broken but this guy comes in for the rescue! It works really well and I am sure it will be good for car as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not for most emergency situations
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but I'd say it's best for older people or someone not wanting to carry/crank a floor jack once in a while. bought it for my Honda so I'd have a lightweight jack, broke when I needed it most, and I missed the return window because the car was towed to a transmission shop for a week and a half.. Bought it July 16th, picture was August 10th..
customer_reviews.author: Justen A.

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Great thoughtful design in a compact box, with box cover printed a hazard sign, connectors to either battery or 12V outlet, built-in flashlight, and hand crank if no battery. Jacked up our Nissan Rogue 2016 like a breeze. Price was medium but not the cheapest.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: What I like about is that it has all the tools needed should I have a flat and need to change the tire myself! Checked out all the items and all worked as described!
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Making life easier to swap out a flat tire on the road.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have it in my car for emergency. Should I have a tire blowout on the road, this will surely come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Vang

customer_reviews.title: No more pumping a jack handle
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Lifted my 6000k explorer. Its loud. Even after oiling the screw. It works. The saddle tops could be cut a little wider. The stick on the pinch welds of both my cars
customer_reviews.author: 909cobra

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first use
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this piece of junk. The jack broke during first use on a small size truck: It was scary when it happened. It is a dangerous jack to use. To make matters worse, it happen the day after the returned window closed so I am stock with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool to have good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok picked up the wife Ford Expedition easy works great much easier than by hand comes in a nice case lovely tool to have
customer_reviews.author: matt c.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Gearbox split on first lowering of jack. Jack stuck after lowering my car. Done with this jack.
customer_reviews.author: molar

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a electric car jack for my car and tried this one This works great Good and strong materials used in this I can use it in 12V electric socket for this Simple and easy to use Comes with a very nice and solid box so carrying is easy Overall a nice product!
customer_reviews.author: smruti sahoo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The jack works great for our regular sized SUV, won’t lift my 2013 Chevy 2500HD Duramax.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: It works okay.
customer_reviews.text: Jack lifts the car very slowly and it is noisy. Ha rot be on a flat surface to have stability. I like that I don’t have to manually pump the Jack.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora808

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I've been testing it at home for working on cars,trucks, and jeeps. I keep it in my truck, I also keep one in my jeep.
customer_reviews.author: gipeanut1

customer_reviews.title: when you pull the trigger on the gun to remove or put on the lug nuts, be paitent, it takes some time to charge
customer_reviews.text: So much easier that he rational car jack systems. I have stopped to help people that I see with flats that are either struggling, don't know what they are doing, or this one persons whos scissor jack was rusted so bad it would not open. I recommend the appropriate size of this tool for every vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Necessary
customer_reviews.text: Wow changing tires is now a non issue. This thing performed perfectly and easily lifted my car. Super excited about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Just as described & a necessary!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a second one for himself and one for our son. He thinks they are indespendsable for emergencies! Has used it to help others!
customer_reviews.author: JudyB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend you buy this jack!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly on my trail blazer EXT without any problems. It was able to lift it up easily and when I had questions the company was extremely helpful with everything that I needed. Highly recommend to buy
customer_reviews.author: Richard Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product will make lifting the vehicle much easier and faster than using the factory jack.
customer_reviews.author: BigH

customer_reviews.title: updated review
customer_reviews.text: Updated I used the impact wrench now for the second time and now its broken and don't work, the motor runs but not breaking lugs at all started out good but second use its already over not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: vincent smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product has beyond exceeded my expectations. I used the product to change my oil and check my break pads. I connected it to my car battery. I believe the clamps that go on the battery need to be made stronger they were alil flimsy with the rubber coming off. Other then that the jack easily lifted my car with ease. I was so impressed and glad I didn't have to go to the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Isacc V.

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: If you ever have to switch tires between season, get this thing. It is super fast and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the special man in your life!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father for Christmas. He loves it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Z

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: This jacked worked great. It was fast and effortless to lift the car up. It took me about 45 minutes to do a full tire rotation with the jacks .The jack also features automatically stop when it reaches the height limitation that is good to protect the motor.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyhuang1998

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: Product is limited on weight, understand that this is still a normal screw jack. But it was useful on smaller vehicles. Great as a gift for your kids that drive.
customer_reviews.author: mario tovar

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Lifts my 2011 cadillac escalade without a problem. No hiccups whatsoever. I've had it for maybe 6 months. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: T.Somozo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times and its simple to use and very safe. It has a good build quality and the carrying case is really convenient
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: It works but doesn't last ..
customer_reviews.text: It worked alright for the first about 10 uses (even though it takes forever to fill up) but now it won't work at all. I thought it was my cigarette lighter, but I've tried on three other vehicles and it has stopped working. it is a cheap product so I think it's worth it to spend more for a higher quality durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice products
customer_reviews.text: Did you see? It's very easy to get up. the plug put in the car charger . Put the jack on the chassis and press the button. Easy to use for everyone . That's why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Jack
customer_reviews.text: This jack works as described and the person I bought if for finally used it to change out a flat: She felt Empowered!
customer_reviews.author: DrewT4R

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy while I was helping a friend do some car work! It did exactly as described lifting the car up and then we used it to take the wheel off! Very good buy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: TONY

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, easy to use, doesn’t take up to much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good jack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car jack because the floor in front of my garage has many small holes, so that the wheels of my trolley floor jack will get stuck into these holes and making scary grinding sound when lifting the car. This jack is very easy to use and even my wife can use it. The box has a reflective triangle on the back, which can be used as a warning in case of emergency. Generally very good product
customer_reviews.author: Bo Dong

customer_reviews.title: Jack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use case has everything yo might need if you ever get a flat tire on the road
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: well see after a feq uses how it preforms... Nice case
customer_reviews.author: Roy Steichen

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I tried it today, it took me less 2 minutes to get my car up, it was very good,my husband changed tires last week,my husband spent an hour,so tirked, that's why I bought it,too convenient
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough to fit behind his truck seat.
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise for my husband who is disabled. Haven't had to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item for Mercedes
customer_reviews.text: It's solid. Use it for my 2007 Mercedes E350 which is kind of heavy. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: The USA Shopping Center

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works well... Glad to have it on board!
customer_reviews.author: golfmann

customer_reviews.title: Urgent RIP OFF Product!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first and only time I go to use this device and the electric lug wrench doesn’t work, it’s spinns inside the device and the actual outside part doesn’t rotate at all!!!! Stuck on the highway for over 4 hours! This is a horrible product and the drive inside the lug wrench started smoking white when I tried to Use it!!!! This is a cheap product and doesn’t work! I’m imagining there probably isn’t a one year warranty the seller could be facing a lawsuit, as my wife is a litigation attorney. This is by far the worst things I’ve had to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Vega

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: The carry case is a little on the cheap side, but the jack and wrench work great, I use it for my RZR.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: won't lift my cars, it is to weak and it does me no good to have it.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to lift my chevy and my Lincoln and it was just to weak to do the job. I realize that it is well past the return. Can I send it back? I didn't take it out and try it until I need it. and it is just to weak to lift my Autos.
customer_reviews.author: evangeorge

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This product is solidly built and lifted my Honda civic without a struggle. I am pleased with this purchase, and feel confident will work properly in a future time of need.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: is not ready to use out of box. additional fittings needed for use of electric wrench
customer_reviews.text: Paid a lot of money for this kit and the electric wrench doesn’t even have the correct fittings to use the sockets this kit comes with on your car. so much for a set huh. how do you fit a half in. drive to a 17mm/19mm or 21mm/23mm dual head socket? this kit doesn't have the piece needed i can tell you that.
customer_reviews.author: JaredSmith

customer_reviews.title: Haven't figured out how to use the wrench yet. Pilot error.
customer_reviews.text: Sits in the back of the car now permanently hidden away. along with a spare tire.
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth D. Parate

customer_reviews.title: Worked very good. Lifted it with ease
customer_reviews.text: Used this to lift my atv up to change a tire. Worked very good. Lifted it with ease. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: bradley kramer

customer_reviews.title: This Jack is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This Jack is super easy to use! I am a mail carrier on Rural roads and get frequent flat tires. It was amazingly simple to put it under my car and push the button and jack it up. Saved me so much time. I recommended these to all of my co-workers.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My dad and brother are planning on purchasing one after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: mocha30

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool To Have
customer_reviews.text: It has saved me one time that was worth it. Stranded in parking lot with flat no spare had to raise the car up then use the air compressor! Worked great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boyne

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUT STILL CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: I use the jack for a car & its work fine, but then i use it for my ford transit van & it band the jack, so the jack is no more useful the rest is good, the tire inflator takes a long time
customer_reviews.author: y. s.

customer_reviews.title: Jack stopped working after one use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely dissatisfied with this jack. It stopped working after just one use!! Since it is after the Amazon return window I believe ROGTZ must either repair or replace the jack!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with ample cord length.
customer_reviews.text: I like it being in a carrying case. I have an antique car and don't want to ruin the bumpers if I have to change a tire. This slips under the car nicely.

customer_reviews.text: Only had to use it once so far but it is definitely worth the money and an amazing 12v lift jack. Extremely satisfied and I highly recommend it.

product_meta.title: ROGTZ Electric Car Floor Jack Set 3 Ton All-in-one Automatic 12v Scissor Lift Jack with Impact Wrench and Tire Inflator Pump for Tire Change & Replacement
feature_bullets: ★ Never use it on sloped ground,be sure to use it on a flat road. The display picture shows the correct way to place the electric car jack Updated Version Provides Higher Stability and Safety: Our electric car jack Heavy-duty steel construction, large base and saddle make this car jack strong and stable. wear-resistant.contact suface and compact triangle design for extra stability. Due to the safety compact design, jack will automatically stop working when it reaches the height limitation (17in)

★ Best choice for Sedan and SUV(under 3T): Two removable raised heads are respectively designed for Sedan and SUV. Vehicles under 3 ton can be easily lifted, but DO NOT use it on the trucks and those beyond 3 ton. Two-way Power Supply: It can be connected to either a 12 V outlet or car battery, two connector choices make it a necessary car repair tool when run into roadside emergencies. reinforced solid screw rod makes the electric car jack will not easily be torn apart or twisted

★Get Done in Minutes: It takes ONLY about 2 minutes to reach a maximum height (17in) with loading capacity as high as 3T; Electric Impact Wrench powerful latest and upgraded version removes the nuts by pressing the switch for about 5 seconds.Whether men or women can replace the tire with ease in any emergent case.Save Effort : Car Electric Jack with Controller is perfect for emergent roadside tire change and repair

★ Built-in flashlight for Night Use: The electric car jack and Electric Impact Wrench convenient built-in flash LED light enables operation at night or in the dimmed light without any additional lighting tools.Besides it’s totally water-proof so you can use it even on rainy day.Especially, including a newly developed jump starter,the car repair tool let you no more fighting with an old-fashioned hand jack or the dark of a night.Just power on the jump starter and touch a button for smooth lift

★ Professional Double-Purpose Tool Box: The Package includes Electric car jack x1(SUV headx1 Chopping headx1) a suitcase, 2 double socket wrenches (17/19 mm & 21/23 mm) and 2 spare fuses. Tire Inflator Pump x1 .The structure of the floor jack is succinct and easy to operate with a compact and organized storage box. All the electric jacks are equipped with a powerful, firm suitcase, which helps keeping the components and parts well organized, and conveniently fits in your vehicle
